name: Alien Evolution Clicker: Species Evolving
description:
If you love evolve games, check this planetary quest! Control the evolution process on very strange alien planet, filled with fun alien beasts! Be unhuman, enjoy inhuman evolution!
Drive evolution faster with your thumb! This game evolution clicker will help you to manipulate evolution of very strange creatures! Choose evolution of aliens, go through each stage evolution – from DNA spiral and bacteria to mighty monsters, robotic alien or even Universal Overmind! Explore and unlock all branches of evolution tree!
Our alien world evolution simulation is waiting for you! Small fishes and reptiles, strange creatures, cool robots – try to get them all! Forget about alien battles, make your evolution faster to create new species, and use different power-ups – money box brings more money, and magnet boost evolution speed!
A great gift for all, who love monster evolution games! Extraterrestrial evolution starts now!
